title: Got baned for no reason
body: I started ranked game solo/duo was in champion select everyone selected champion and then the game should of started loading and nothing started I whaited for like 1 min and then restarted the game when I enterd I got baned for 5 games and it say leaver/remake WTF is going on what did I done to deserv this?

replies.body: YES EXACT THING HAPPENED TO ME!!! Did it say like an error has occured? I tried posting something but the only thing that they said is that what a "ban" is and what a "leaverbuster" is.

no the loading screen didn't even open its just like league of legends was closed I was whaiting for it to open for like 1 min and when I reopen the game I was baned leaver buster WTF can anyone please help us with this I lost like 20 lp and got baned for 5 games for something I didn't done :(
Yeah ikr i wish they could take it away but we cant do anything about it. Ive looked at other posts and nobody has helped

A disconnection negatively affects **everyone** in the match, regardless of your intent. This is a big reason as to why all disconnections are treated equally and why we cannot remove or modify these penalties. Additionally, you'll **never** receive a penalty because of a single disconnection and a 5--game penalty is only added to your account *after* a *trend of disconnections* has occurred on your account.

What most likely occurred was your connection to the gameservers was unstable, causing your client to not make the right connection to the game instance. This is most often influenced by conflicting network settings, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure these settings are in good standing. Please let me know the results of those steps.
